title: Everything you ever wanted to know about the Aztecs, but were afraid to ask
itunes:title: Everything you ever wanted to know about the Aztecs, but were afraid to ask
itunes:subtitle: Caroline Dodds Pennock responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about the Mesoamerican civilisation. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In the latest of our series tackling the big questions on major historical topics, historian Caroline Dodds Pennock responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about the Mesoamerican civilisation, including a discussion of the practice of human sacrifice. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
